name: Doodle Jump: Or Insight Into The Wandering Mind of a Bored Artist
name_original: Doodle Jump: Or Insight Into The Wandering Mind of a Bored Artist
description:
Doodle Jump: Or Insight Into The Wandering Mind of a Bored Artist is a 2D platformer about discovery, playfulness and the merging of reality and imagination.

The game was made by a team of 4 students from the KADK, Copenhagen. The game was made over the course of 4 weeks.

Made by Murray Somerville / Laura Blicher / Mathias Pedersen / Ivan Ilko
